title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies in Practice: VR-Based Reflective Instructional Design: Short-Term Training for Science Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational educational theories and science curriculum content
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their teaching behaviors through reflective thinking in a VR classroom simulation environment.
Learners can diagnose specific problems in science lesson design using VR-based observational data.
Learners can develop improved teaching strategies in VR lesson simulations by combining peer feedback and instructor coaching.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
